node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊記錄，沒有病徴，任職於德福廣場麥當勞，負責廚房工作。其家人為確診個案 ( 第 #1739 宗個案患者 )。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and has no symptoms. He works at the McDonalds in Telford Plaza and is in charge of kitchen work. His family member is patient #1739.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
node.group_name_zh: 屯門中央廣場富臨酒家
node.group_name_en:
Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum
Restaurant
node.group_description_zh: 7 月 11 日在屯門中央廣場富臨酒家舉行的 20  席生日聚會，及後有多名出席者確診。另外也有不同日子到訪該富臨酒家的食客確診。
node.group_description_en: A birthday celebration event with 20 tables was held on Jul 11 at Fulum Restaurant, Tuen Mun Central Square. Some of the participants were found to be confirmed cases. There are some confirmed cases had visited the same restaurant.

node.location_zh: 德福廣場一期 麥當勞
